title: As a young boy I saw Louis Armstrong play at Brogden Hall.  I remember him playing Hello Dolly.  It was unusual that someone that \famous\" had a concert in Wilmington.  I would like to know if anyone remembers when that was.  Was sometime in the 60\'s"
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12626
